name: AZER PYROMANCER

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.text: At the end of each of the azer's turns, each creature of the azer's choice in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the azer takes 11 (2d10) Fire damage unless the azer has the Incapacitated condition.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The azer sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The azer makes two Flame Burst attacks.

actions.name: Flame Burst
actions.text: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.text: The azer casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Elementalism, Mage Hand 1/Day:

reactions.name: Hellish Rebuke (2/Day)
reactions.text: The azer casts Hellish Rebuke in response to that spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.
